Title: silverstripe/taxonomy SQL Injection vulnerability
Description: There is a vulnerability in silverstripe/taxonomy module that allows SQL injection. This affected controller (`TaxonomyDirectoryController`) is disabled by default and must be enabled by a developer for the exploit to be possible.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.1, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.0.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.3.0, all versions starting from 1.3.1 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.1
